Blindfear:

Blindfear arrived where Battle was and open fire agaisnt Darkwing (25 
shots)


> Darkwing saw the shots head for Dreadwind but as he turned to fire 
> at Autofire he was met by the fist of Firestrike.  Once again his 
> head snapped back as he went off line the last thing him seeing 
> was an evil grin on Firestrikes face.
> 
> Dreadwind cirlced up avoiding the shots but not the cannon's.  All 
> four hit him one after the other, sending the flying but sailing to 
the 
> ground in a spiral.  When he hit the ground a large circle of dust 
> surrounded him.
